Option 3: EAA of aggregate ambition and technical EAA of individual INDCs (transparency. clarity. comparability. etc.)
Option 4: Option 3 plus a political assessment of individual INDCs (ambition and equity/fairness)
Option 5: Option 4 and a formal mechanism for involving inputs from civil society
